Availability over Bank Holiday (Monday 26th August)

Care Services: Open as usual.

Testing/Dispatch: Closed.

Supplements: Orders placed between Friday 23rd - Monday 26th will be dispatched on Tuesday 27th

Food & Drink Allergy Test, Food & Drink Intolerance Test and At-home self-tests: Orders placed between Friday 23rd - Monday 26th will be dispatched on Tuesday 27th

Contact information

Please use the form on this page or our support email address below to get in touch, we aim to respond to you within 48 hours.

We are also available to call or live chat:

Sat-Sun: Midday-8pm
